content:
Scenario: Part-time and flexible work options support intensive care periods
    Given Sarah may need reduced hours during intensive care periods
    And full-time work may be unsustainable at some life stages
    When Sarah's care responsibilities increase
    Then workplace should offer part-time and flexible work options
    And reduced hours should not mean career penalty
    And the workplace_elohim should coordinate schedule adjustments
    And Sarah should be able to modulate work commitment based on care needs
    And career paths should accommodate care economy participation
